Graphs

Graphs

What you measure matters. The cool thing is that you get to choose what you measure. Here I choose to measure mostly the process-stuff like hours, attention, and sleep on a daily basis to see how if translates into the results-stuff like money and cheese-steaks on quarterly or yearly basis.
